page.title: 18Clubs - Derbyshire
page.content: To people in the Derbyshire side of the area the following clubs are available. The Playgroup for the under 5's meets in the village hall at Norbury for two sessions each week. Children can join the Youth Club at 8 years, they meet once a week in term time for games. Sporting and education trips are organised and weekend hostelling. Men can join Roston Football Club which plays the Summer League. The home pitch is at Norbury Farm. The Norbury and Roston Womens Institute was founded in 1930 and has had a popular drama group for a number of years. An annual production is put on in the Spring, members children being included in the cast. Dovelands, the over 60's club, meet monthly with speakers and games sessions. A number of outings are organised each year.
